LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Fundamental Capability
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: A basic capability usually considered extremely common or compulsory - such as speaking or walking.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Medical
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Knowledge or ability pertaining to surgery, medical, or other biological manipulations.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Advanced Capability
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: A complex or unusual capability, ususally something you are able to do rather than something you know.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Plant Care
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: A complex or unusual capability, ususally something you are able to do rather than something you know, focused on plant care.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Basic Fabrication
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Use of tools, machines, and related abilities to fabricate items, clothing, or other small scale things.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Advanced Fabrication
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Use of advanced tools, machines, and related abilities to fabricate items, clothing, or other small scale things.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Engineering
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Use of advanced tools, machines, and related abilities to fabricate complex items, tools, robots etc.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Construction
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Construction of large scale structures, objects, buildings, and vehicles.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: General Knowledge
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Something you know, often theoretical or not immediately applicable. History, sciences, etc.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Physics Knowledge
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Something you know, often theoretical or not immediately applicable. History, sciences, etc about Physics.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Exotic Physics Knowledge
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Something you know, often theoretical or not immediately applicable. History, sciences, etc about Physics.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Chemistry Knowledge
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Something you know, often theoretical or not immediately applicable. History, sciences, etc about Chemistry.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Advanced Chemistry Knowledge
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Something you know, often theoretical or not immediately applicable. History, sciences, etc about Advanced Chemistry.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Geology Knowledge
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Something you know, often theoretical or not immediately applicable. History, sciences, etc about Geology.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Advanced Geology Knowledge
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Something you know, often theoretical or not immediately applicable. History, sciences, etc about Advanced Geology.

LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.label: Biology Knowledge
LifeLessons.ProficiencyCategoryDef.description: Something you know, often theoretical or not immediately applicable. History, sciences, etc about Biology.
